name: El Explorador
excerpt: Great for families, this private garden is located in a hilly area 3km northeast of the town center. You can walk to it in about 45 minutes. The 2…
detail_description: Great for families, this private garden is located in a hilly area 3km northeast of the town center. You can walk to it in about 45 minutes. The 2 hectares of gardens are designed to look like something out of Alice in Wonderland, with no shortage of quirky eye-catching displays, including fanciful suspension bridges, koi ponds and playful sculptures.

name: Parque José Domingo Médica
excerpt: Boquete's central plaza has flowers, a fountain and a children’s playground.
detail_description: Boquete's central plaza has flowers, a fountain and a children’s playground.

name: La Piedra Pintada de Caldera
excerpt: Some of the best examples of petroglyphs found in Panama can be seen in this park at Caldera, about 23km southeast of Boquete. It's located 400m down a…
detail_description: Some of the best examples of petroglyphs found in Panama can be seen in this park at Caldera, about 23km southeast of Boquete. It's located 400m down a marked trail about 1km past the police station on the right.
